html:
{% for box in doc.custom_shipment_box %}

Inner Box: {{ box.inner_box_no }}

Outer Box: {{ box.outer_box }}

Item Code: {{ box.item_code }}

Item Description: {{ box.item_description }}

Delivery Note: {{ box.delivery_note }}

{% if box.delivery_note %} {% set dn = frappe.get_doc("Delivery Note", box.delivery_note) %}

Date: {{ dn.posting_date }}

{% if dn.sales_order %} {% set so = frappe.get_doc("Sales Order", dn.sales_order) %}

Customer PO: {{ so.customer_po }}

Customer Name: {{ so.customer }}

{% else %}

Customer Name: {{ dn.customer_name }}

{% endif %} {% endif %}
{% endfor %}
name: INNER BOX LABEL PRINT FORMAT
